history.text:
Semi-automatic rimfire pistols equal to .50 caliber (12.7 mm) or less.
Note 1 to 0A507.a, 0A507.b: “Parts” and “components” that are “specially designed” for a commodity classified under .a or .b of this entry, except those controlled under ECCN 0A509, are controlled under ECCN 0A501.c, 0A501.d, 0A501.x, 0A501.y.
Technical Note to 0A507: Firearms described in 0A507 includes those chambered for the .50 BMG cartridge, including revolvers, or that may be developed to fire .50 BMG cartridges.

content.text: Note 1 to 0A507.a, 0A507.b: “Parts” and “components” that are “specially designed” for a commodity classified under .a or .b of this entry, except those controlled under ECCN 0A509, are controlled under ECCN 0A501.c, 0A501.d, 0A501.x, 0A501.y.

content.html:
Technical Note to 0A507:

Firearms described in 0A507 includes those chambered for the .50 BMG cartridge, including revolvers, or that may be developed to fire .50 BMG cartridges.
content.text: Technical Note to 0A507: Firearms described in 0A507 includes those chambered for the .50 BMG cartridge, including revolvers, or that may be developed to fire .50 BMG cartridges.
